name: aave-search
title: Aave Contract Search
description: Quickly search and access official Aave ecosystem smart contract addresses across multiple networks
author: smbdy

commands.name: aave
commands.title: Search Smart Contracts
commands.subtitle: Aave Protocol
commands.description: Quickly search and access official Aave ecosystem smart contract addresses across multiple networks

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
